name: Instyle Matte Lipstick - 018 | Stunning 8-Hour Wear Velvet Finish
description:
Instyle Matte Lipstick - 018: The Perfect Matte Finish for Long-lasting Glamour

The Instyle Matte Lipstick - 018 delivers an exquisite color payoff with its luxuriously smooth formula that glides effortlessly across your lips. This stunning shade offers the perfect balance between sophistication and boldness, making it an essential addition to your makeup collection. 💄✨

Product Information

Product Type Matte Lipstick
Shade Number 018
Finish Matte
Size Standard (3.5g)
Brand Instyle

Key Features of Instyle Matte Lipstick - 018

  • Long-lasting Formula: Stays put for up to 8 hours without fading or transferring 🕗
  • Hydrating Ingredients: Contains vitamin E and natural oils to prevent drying and cracking
  • Intense Pigmentation: One-swipe application for full, rich color coverage
  • Comfortable Wear: Lightweight feel that doesn't cake or settle into fine lines
  • Cruelty-Free: Not tested on animals 🐰

The Instyle Matte Lipstick Experience

The Instyle Matte Lipstick - 018 transforms your makeup routine with its velvety texture that doesn't compromise on comfort. Unlike many matte formulations that leave lips feeling parched, this innovative formula keeps your lips moisturized throughout the day while maintaining that coveted matte finish.

Shade 018 offers a versatile color that complements a wide range of skin tones and can be worn for both everyday elegance and special occasions. The sleek packaging ensures easy application on-the-go, making touch-ups effortless whenever needed.

How to Apply Your Instyle Matte Lipstick - 018

For best results, start with exfoliated, moisturized lips. Apply a thin layer of lip balm and blot excess. Line your lips with a complementary lip liner, then apply Instyle Matte Lipstick - 018 directly from the bullet or with a lip brush for more precision. For increased longevity, apply, blot with tissue, and apply a second coat.

Frequently Asked Question

How can I make my Instyle Matte Lipstick last even longer?
To maximize the wear time of your Instyle Matte Lipstick - 018, prep lips with a gentle scrub and apply a thin layer of translucent powder over your lip liner before applying the lipstick. After application, place a single-ply tissue over your lips and lightly dust with translucent powder again. This setting technique can extend wear time by 2-3 hours. 🕒
